Show / Hide Table of Contents

Development Tools

Dnspy is used to view existing Bannerlord code. View more extensive documentation here.
Visual Studio is used to develop the mod. We recommend that you use Community 2019.

Libraries

LiteNetLib is a library that we use to handle basic network protocol.
RailgunNet is used to provide a higher level networking interface. This includes entity management.
